name: #ShadowLife
description:
Skulk in the shadows and snatch coins right out from under the security drones.

Arrow keys to move and space bar to jump!

For weekly game jam #47, the theme was thief!

****there was volumetric lights for the drones, but it wasn't supported by webGL.  We're hoping to find a solution soon!

Code/Level Desgin: Geoff Ciccarelli

Character/Environment Modeling/Rigging/Music - Justin Wilcott

Lighting/UI Design:  Alex Van Dyne
